name: Disfigure
description:
In an arena shrouded by darkness, pay keen attention to your surroundings where monsters could be lurking. Choose between circle and cone vision: one allows you to see all around but not far, while the latter allows you to see far in one direction.

Variety of Builds

Choose from over 100 upgrades and 90 weapon perks to create a unique build for each run. Become a pyromaniac, shoot lightning, fire a storm of bullets, or even harness light to destroy your enemies!

Variety of Weapons

Unlock new weapons with currency earned from runs! Each weapon behaves differently and has its own unique perks allowing for a multitude of different builds.

Content

  • 9 unique enemies
  • 3 horrifying bosses
  • Over 100 upgrades to choose from
  • 10 weapons each with unique perks
  • Quick restarts with 20 minute runs that can also be played endlessly
  • 2 difficulty modes
  • Online leaderboards
